leaf_cluster_name: 医学影像-分割/检测/诊断生态
task_chain: 预处理→训练/推理→评测→部署
tool_form: 框架 + 标注/数据 + 部署

tools.name: DINOv2-3D-Med
tools.one_line_profile: 3D implementation of DINOv2 for self-supervised pretraining on medical images
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of DINOv2 adapted for 3D volumetric medical imaging, supporting self-supervised pretraining pipelines using Lightly and MONAI frameworks.

tools.name: pyradiomics
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for extraction of Radiomics features from medical images
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python package for the extraction of Radiomics features from 2D and 3D medical images and binary masks, widely used for quantitative image analysis.

tools.name: AlizaMS
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance DICOM viewer and medical image analyzer
tools.detailed_description: A DICOM viewer and medical image analysis tool written in C++, supporting 2D/3D visualization and basic measurement tasks.

tools.name: ecg-dicom-web-viewer
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based viewer for ECG files in DICOM format
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript library and viewer for rendering Electrocardiogram (ECG) data stored in DICOM format directly in web browsers.

tools.name: pydicer
tools.one_line_profile: Python tool for converting DICOM data to analysis-ready formats
tools.detailed_description: A tool to streamline the conversion of DICOM data into formats suitable for research (like NIfTI) and analysis, handling RTStructs and other radiotherapy specific data.

tools.name: brkraw
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to access and convert raw Bruker Biospin MRI data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python tool and library to access, read, and convert raw data from Bruker Biospin MRI scanners, facilitating integration into standard neuroimaging pipelines.

tools.name: OHIF-AI
tools.one_line_profile: OHIF DICOM Viewer integrated with server-side AI segmentation models
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the OHIF DICOM Web viewer that integrates server-side AI models (like SAM2, medSAM) for advanced interactive segmentation and annotation.

tools.name: SlicerAutomatedDentalTools
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Slicer extension for automated dental image analysis
tools.detailed_description: A 3D Slicer extension providing automated tools for dental CBCT analysis, including segmentation and landmark detection.

tools.name: picai_prep
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing library for 3D prostate MRI data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for preprocessing 3D medical images (specifically MRI) for prostate cancer detection tasks, handling resampling and standardization.

tools.name: rse-grand-challenge-metrics
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for creating evaluation metrics for Grand Challenge competitions
tools.detailed_description: A library (evalutils) to assist in creating evaluation containers and metrics for medical imaging challenges hosted on grand-challenge.org.

tools.name: DICOMweb-js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript client for DICOM Web Services
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript client library for consuming DICOM Web Services (QIDO-RS, WADO-RS, STOW-RS), enabling web-based medical imaging applications.

tools.name: bidscoin

tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly tool to convert source-level neuroimaging data (DICOM/PAR) into the Brain Imaging Data Structure (BIDS) standard, featuring a GUI and heuristics.

tools.name: pypx

tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper around DCMTK and PyDicom to facilitate interaction with PACS (Picture Archiving and Communication Systems) for querying and retrieving medical images.

tools.name: TotalSegmentator-AIDE
tools.one_line_profile: TotalSegmentator packaged as a MONAI Application Package
tools.detailed_description: A packaging of the TotalSegmentator tool into the MONAI Application Package (MAP) format, enabling easy deployment and execution of whole-body segmentation tasks.

tools.name: Asclepios-DICOM-Viewer
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source DICOM viewer based on Qt and VTK
tools.detailed_description: A desktop DICOM viewer application developed in C++ using Qt and VTK, providing visualization capabilities for medical imaging data.

tools.name: dicomweb-wsi-viewer
tools.one_line_profile: Web viewer for Whole Slide Imaging (WSI) via DICOMweb
tools.detailed_description: A proof-of-concept web viewer for Whole Slide Imaging (digital pathology) that consumes data via the Google Cloud Healthcare DICOM API.

tools.name: go-dicom-parser
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient DICOM parsing library in Go
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and efficient library written in Go for parsing and processing DICOM files, suitable for high-performance data ingestion pipelines.

tools.name: wsi-to-dicom-converter
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for converting Whole Slide Images to DICOM format
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool and library for converting various Whole Slide Image (WSI) formats into the standard DICOM format, facilitating interoperability in digital pathology.

tools.name: iSEG

tools.detailed_description: The Medical Image Segmentation Tool Set (iSEG) is a fully integrated segmentation toolbox (including pre- and postprocessing) for the efficient, fast, and flexible generation of anatomical models from various types of imaging data.

tools.name: ImagePy
tools.one_line_profile: Image processing framework based on plugin architecture

tools.name: dicom-microscopy-viewer

tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for viewing DICOM Slide Microscopy objects in web browsers, supporting visualization of whole slide images.

tools.name: dicomweb-client

tools.name: highdicom

tools.name: libdicom

tools.name: slim
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based DICOM slide microscopy viewer and annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: An interoperable web-based viewer and annotation tool for DICOM slide microscopy, facilitating the visualization and labeling of whole slide images.

tools.name: jsdicom
tools.one_line_profile: DICOM library and viewer in JavaScript
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library and viewer for handling and visualizing DICOM images in web environments.

tools.name: jsdicom-lib

tools.name: simpleITK-Snap

tools.name: MedEye3d.jl

tools.name: VolView

tools.name: ITKPOCUS

tools.name: SlicerNNUnet

tools.name: dicom-anonymizer

tools.name: dicom-exporter

tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to evaluate the performance of Vision-Language Models (VLM) specifically on medical domain tasks.

tools.name: DICOMator

tools.name: SMMILE
